message.body: Echo_Mask is now live! Streaming I Wanna Be The Guy: finishing the santa games, then planting Nogard's seeds

With the teleporter you can get a sight of what is past that elevator puzzle

Ya should really continue that this year
just shoot the sun out of the sky. ez

you kind of get what the triggers are if you think about it

Is it the game i already requested
the one I have in mind is "Prismatic Needle"

Honestly this screen does not look that good
it's a game that made me review it, which is super rare for me

Don't worry, Cosmo already HATES you after the Novelty race :p

umaru i think its name is

dragon maid is the one with the boob physics
i refuse to say loli as it violates my value system
I somehow really did not take you for an anime watcher lol
Echo, he looks too formal for it you know?
i think it might actually be the shirt
put exactly one thing on the bookshelf
oh is it not a santa game
dw the game gets awesome soon
oh man I could not have guessed LSS made this

there is indeed a naked mario

there's two naked marios in eclipse but one of them is only gettable with dev tools now
can you jump up the wall on the next screen
im doing a little mid, but it is what it is
i'll try to think of a game you would actually enjoy this time lmao, i'll redeem this again sometime
lss is a great maker, hes done better than this
yea everyone starts somewhere, this was his first game and he's definitely gotten better
i wanna be the guy is basically copyright the game
this is an i wanna be the guy fangame, not the original
what did you do last time skulldude
thats true, but i do feel guilty lmao

out of sheer curiosity of what he would think
have you played the ultimate sudoku classic of kill the last boss
i wanna kill the last boss is an incredible game

not the same style, its a different approach to sudoku
theres a lot of ways you can do sudoku
its the style of sudoku where someone was trying to make an epic adventure game but doens't know what they're doing

oh that's the trap game with the colonel at the end

its kill the last boss time (whenever u do it)
whoe put weedle (wood needle) in my treedle (tree needle)
wait, can i redeem another one
game press r to restart over
i dont mind waiting at all
up to u if u dont mind
NEEDLE GAME OF THE YEAR BROOOOOOOO

doesnt need to be the best and longest thing ever
its not a bad idea to do that but gotta know where to draw the line
ive found myself to be more appreciative of my earlier stages after ive released my game and hadn't touched the stages after i left them how they were post testing
im still very fond of everything i made in RP, but if i tried making sth like it this year itd be a little different for sure
>makes something ages ago in the start of the game, later on u wanna change it cuz ur not satisfied anymore
ur gonna tell me thats not what youre living this exact moment, plasma...

thats all im allowed to say, legally
got the fangame awards trailers coming up to hopefully show some progress on things
bro your style is just way above average in general
you could drop a 50 floor jtool needle game and i would probably love it
@Skulldude_Real oh maybe I should make a trailer for my secret santa game
oh you gotta watch it then
there was the one in 2020 where it had a release date of may 2020
i see he cut the release date out of the video
i havent seen this in a while, exciting
phgqed and i wanted to drop a trailer for a new game we were gonna work on but the trailer deadline is in a month and we still havent actually started the game lmao
first awards was in 2019 iirc bro
that fight is nothing like this
I am proud of the trailer
i was super ecstatic we had that on the very first award show
yeah theres at least 20 of those
the % of successful releases of fga trailer games is tragically low
actually i can check the number right now
and since you're playing this game, reminder that i really hope lss' is still coming too
he had a trailer 2 years ago
i wanna escape the elemental cube, magic tower game
alejo had a magic tower game that may be dead
although he's working on the mario party game now right?
mario party is way better than orange juice...
i'm super excited for the party game too
now that i set up a server for fangameguesser i should probably consider something more elaborate that uses it but i'm not sure i'll have the motivation for that
ive played both a lot too, orange juice only takes the worst part of mario party and explode the rng to unhuman levels whenever it wants to
its fangame adjacent not really a fangame, but you can take a look at it and understand what its about in 10 minutes
the rng dependent chaos is more controlled on mario party and slower paced than in orange juice
just makes the experience far more enjoyable to me
the pay to win characters are beyond stupid
theres a shitton of paid dlc in it, it shouldnt be mandatory to have them and then feel like youre starting to have a good time
yeah it just doesnt entice me enough to play it more than the once in a year occasion with my friends when we have absolutely nothing else to do
adding one aimed projectile to any attack makes it instantly so much harder
the thing dangling from the ceiling that doesn't look like one really
i have no idea but you are gonna have to refight it either way
also im not gonna do a point redeem since im saving up for my next release so im just gonna throw a recommendation your way for something you should maybe eventually check out, play i wanna realize
mega based gimmick needle i played recently
yeah you'll love it its so good
not too long either, i cleared in about an hour
i mean i am not at all expecting you to play it tonight lol
stream title is a lie FeelsBadMan
one of them classics i suppose

it is surely a little deceptive though
